item.title: Mentioned by iPolitics.ca (subscription)
item.description:
CIDA still funding development firm it sued in 2010
Fantino's office did not respond to requests for comment about the lawsuit at press time Wednesday. For Massimo Pacetti, the Liberal MP who has been pressuring the Conservatives for more information about CRC Sogema, the 2010 lawsuit is troubling.
